properties.areaDesc: Putnam; Western Passaic; Rockland; Northern Westchester; Orange; Northern Fairfield
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 6:43AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
With the saturation in some places within the Lower Hudson Valley
as well as Western Passaic New Jersey and Northern Fairfield
Connecticut early this morning, some patchy freezing fog has
formed. This can lead to patchy areas of black ice on untreated
surfaces. Patchy freezing fog is expected to last into mid
morning.

If going outdoors this morning and traveling, proceed with extra
caution as untreated surfaces will become slippery with any ice
that forms. Also, the fog in a few places will be dense and will
result in visibilities of less than one mile.

Expect temperatures in these areas to rise above freezing between
9 and 10 am with fog dissipating as well.

NWSheadline: Patchy Freezing Fog and Patchy Black Ice.
